{"step_by_step_thinking": "According to Document [0], during criminal arrests, a set of exemplar prints will normally include one print taken from each finger that has been rolled from one edge of the nail to the other, plain (or slap) impressions of each of the four fingers of each hand, and plain impressions of each thumb. Therefore, the thumb is not excluded in fingerprinting (FINDER). The other fingers, including the ring finger, little finger, and middle finger, are all included in the fingerprinting process. Therefore, the answer is not A, C, or D. The only finger pair that is excluded is the thumb, so the correct answer is B.", "answer_choice": "B"}
